channel.title: Documentation on Rebecca Barter
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Rebecca Barter

item.title: Docathon: A Week of Doumentation
item.description: This week is the Docathon at BIDS (a.k.a. that wonderful place that I spend all my time). A docathon is like a hackathon but is focused on developing material and tools for documentation. We have loads of projects signed up to receive some documentation-love and an impressive number of excited participants! We kicked off the event with a series of tutorials for writing “good” documentation. I gave an R-specific tutorial where I discussed using devtools to both develop and document your package.
